module.header:
<style>

div.angrid .table>thead>tr>th {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
}

.confirm-action-alert {
    margin-top: 265px;
}

.bstrap30 .table-striped>tbody>tr:nth-of-type(odd) {
    background-color: #fff !important;
}
.angrid-details .details-content {
  border: none!important;
  background-color: #f4f9ff!important;
}

span.grid-field-value.ng-scope.ng-isolate-scope.block-break {
    padding-left: 11px;
}

.btn-white {
    color: #fff !important;
    border: none !important;
}
div.angrid tr.selected td {
    background-color: #f3dcbf !important;
}

.bstrap30 a {
    color: #337ab7;
    text-decoration: none!important;
    font-weight: 500!important;
    font-family: sans-serif !important;
    letter-spacing: .05em;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.custom-html-header.ng-scope {
    Margin-top: -1px;
    margin-left: 5px;
}

.bstrap30 p {
    margin: 0 0 0 !important;
}

/*
.select-all.pull-left:after {
    content: 'Select.All';
}
*/
.select-all {
    background-color: #fff !important;
}
.bstrap30 input[type=checkbox] {
    height: 20px;
    width: 20px;
}

.xz{
display:none;
}
.selected .xz{
display:block;
}
.xy{
display:block;
}
.selected .xy{
display:none;
}

</style>
module.title: Loans Ready
